title: Power Archiver 2010 v11.50 {Sanpork}
description:
*************************PowerArchiver.2010.v11.50*******************************


>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>


PowerArchiver is one of the most powerful archive utilites available and has been downloaded by tens of millions of users worldwide.

PowerArchiver offers you hundreds of features, yet remains small, easy to use and fast. Novice users will find a familiar interface complete with tutorial and detailed help, while more experienced users can take advantage of full

Explorer integration, multiple encryption methods and advanced compression algorithms.

*********************************************************************************
*********************************************************************************


*****Key features*****

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Complete built-in support (including creating archives and adding files) for ZIP, CAB, LHA (LZH), TAR, TAR.GZ, TAR.BZ2 and BH (BlakHole) files, and built-in support for reading and extracting many other file formats: RAR, ARJ, ARC, ACE, ZOO, GZ and BZIP2
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Built-in support for XXE and UUE encoded files
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Many powerful archive operations (including: renaming files in archive, spanning archives, testing archives, viewing and writing comments, installing archives, and checking archives for viruses)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Internal viewer that supports TXT, RTF, BMP, ICO, WMF, EMF, GIF and JPG (JPEG) files
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Skinnable toolbar
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Drag and Drop from/to Windows Explorer and the Desktop
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Two ways of viewing archives (Classic - all files in the same listing; Explorer - browsing through an archive like folders in Windows Explorer)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Creating powerful ZIP, RAR, ARJ, LHA and BH self-extracting archives
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Complete integration with Windows (extracting archives and creating archives directly from Windows Explorer using powerful "Explorer Shell Extensions")
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Viewing files in all view styles, including "as a Web page"
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Converting between file formats (for example: changing a ZIP archive to CAB archive, or LHA archive to ZIP archive)
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Tool for repairing corrupted ZIP archives
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Tool for extracting multiple archives at once
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Tool for creating backup scripts and running automated backups
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Auto Update to automatically download and install new versions of PowerArchiver
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Batch Zip function to create multiple different archives at once
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Favorite Folders to quickly locate archives
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Printing file list to printer, or exporting file list to HTML or TXT files
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Powerful help in HTML and a tutorial with pictures for beginners
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Many, many other useful and powerful features

=================================================================================


*****What's New*****

Improvements:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Improved RAR extraction - up to 20% faster than before, including WinRar.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Improved speed of zip compression preparation - up to 10x faster than before on many files (both backup and main PA).
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Improved progress bars in various situations.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Added SFX cab option to the shell extensions configuration.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Added write directly option in backup.

Bug Fixes:
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Various zip compression/update/extraction issues reported by testers.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Fixed issue with specific file/folder selection.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Special characters removed from paths when extracted.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· No error when bad password in RAR file.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· filters don't work in backup if folders are selected.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Profile boxes not aligned.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Advanced Options in backup schedule do not work in new backup until backup is reloaded.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· After update, encrypted files inside zip were left unencrypted.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Drag and drop - all possible compression methods shown even if not applicable.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Queue does not work in backup.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Can't select multiple folders in burner tools.

Size : 8.1 MB
